thread.title: Nigeria: Kano Governor Tasks Labour On Housing for Workers
thread.title_full: Nigeria: Kano Governor Tasks Labour On Housing for Workers

title: Nigeria: Kano Governor Tasks Labour On Housing for Workers
text:
Nigeria: My Husband'll Change Living Condition of Nigerians - Aisha Buhari 
"In advanced countries, if you are working, you have shelter", he said, lamenting that the situation was different in Nigeria. 
He also stressed the need for labour unions to work closely towards ensuring that Kano workers are incorporated in the Health Insurance Scheme as s doing would make life better for them. Nigeria
